sql.body: SELECT COUNT(dpc.pin_code) AS 'count' FROM DEVICE_PIN_CODE AS dpc WHERE dpc.pin_enabled = 1 <#if companyId??> AND dpc.company_id = :companyId </#if> <#if status??> AND dpc.pincode_status IN (${status}) </#if>

SELECT dpc.id AS 'id', dpc.company_id AS 'companyId', dpc.pin_code AS 'pinCode', dpc.pin_enabled AS 'enabled', dpc.device_id AS 'deviceId', dpc.store_id AS 'storeId', IFNULL(dpc.batch_no,'-') AS 'batchNo', (CASE dpc.pincode_status WHEN 0 THEN '初始化' WHEN 1 THEN '邮寄中' ELSE '已使用' END ) AS 'pinCodeStatusDesc', dpc.pincode_status AS 'pinCodeStatus', DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(dpc.bind_date, INTERVAL 14 HOUR), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS 'bindingDate', DATE_FORMAT(dpc.createTime,'%Y-%m-%d') AS 'createDate' FROM DEVICE_PIN_CODE AS dpc WHERE dpc.pin_enabled = 1 <#if companyId??> AND dpc.company_id = :companyId </#if> <#if status??> AND dpc.pincode_status IN (${status}) </#if> ORDER BY dpc.createTime DESC LIMIT :offset,:rows
